content: Make your wildest dreams a reality by spending the day blowing shit up with your favorite terminator – Arnold Schwarzenegger. You’ll be flown out to L.A., lodged in a luxury hotel, and get 24 hours to blow shit to pieces with Arnold and a team of pyrotechnics.

Share a cup of joe with a dearly departed loved one by sitting down by this Ouija board coffee table. This unique piece combines an elegant time-tested design with the intricate artwork modeled after the original Ouija board.

Get a glimpse into the future of automotive transportation by checking out the Chevrolet FNR self driving car. This concept car sports an ultra sleek Blade Runner like design with features like crystal clear laser headlights and a roof-mounted radar.

Give your game room some cool ambient lighting using this Pac-Man USB ghost lamp. This great little accessory stands at eight inches tall and can switch between sixteen different color hues so you don’t have to decide between just Inky, Blinky, Pinky, or Clyde.

Leave the competition in the dust when you hit the track in this Porsche 936 go-kart. Built as a replica of the famous auto that won the LeMans in 1981, it features working headlights, a 3-speed transmission, and can reach speeds up to 36 MPH.

Capture amazing footage of yourself in action by heading out with the professional auto follow camera drone. It’s ultra portable, waterproof, and is designed to follow you using a compact tracking device you can wear or stash comfortably in your pocket.

Get one step closer to making your time travelling dreams a reality by acquiring this flux capacitor replica. This officially licensed replica comes expertly made and features working lights that shine bright to create the illusion it’s about to send you to 1955.

titleEN: Knights Of The Round Table Wristwatch
content: Bring the legend of King Arthur to life with this mesmerizing knights of the round table wristwatch. Each of the 12 knights are sculpted in bronze and positioned around a precious black jade dial as they hold out their swords to form a perfect circle.

Maximize the number of limited ports on your laptop by charging your devices using these infinitely interlocking USB cables. The ingenious design allows you to create a human centipede of cables that all connect to one another for endless charging possibilities.

Create an enchanting futuristic environment by decorating your room with this fiber optic fabric. This luminous textile is made up of ultra thin optical fibers that glow evenly along the surface, using very little power – and come available in several vibrant hues.

Get your adrenaline racing when you get behind the wheel of the Donkervoort D8 GTO. This carbon fiber car is powered by a 2.5-liter 5 cylinder engine that produces up to 380 HP, propelling it from 0-60 in 3.3 seconds and reaching speeds up to 168 MPH.

Enjoy the gorgeous outdoor weather without having to suffer the wrath of insects by shielding yourself in the mosquito net hammock. A sturdy net surrounds the entire hammock so that you remain protected from those nasty blood suckers at all times.

Ball like basketball royalty by upgrading your court’s peasant-like regulation equipment to these stunning luxury basketball rims. They feature everything from a stained glass backboard to a solid gold rim making it ideal for the literal ballers of the world.

Give afternoon barbecues a whimsical touch the kids will love by cooking your meats to perfection using these narwhal BBQ skewers. Each lovely stainless steel skewer resembles a friendly narwhal whose come to give you a hand with his extra long 13.3″ horn.

Let clients and business associates know exactly where you stand by handing them one of these check all that apply cards. Depending on how you feel at the moment, you can check all appropriate boxes and pass it to the intended recipient.

Leave a lasting impression on anyone you meet by making yourself over using this glitter beard kit. The kit comes in a handy little pouch and includes everything necessary to transform your fuzz into a fiery shimmering mane.

Experience what it feels like to sit behind the hood of a world renowned sports car everyday at work using the Bugatti Veyron desk. This eye-catching piece sports a bold design modeled after the front end of the ultra rare and expensive Bugatti Veyron.

Entertain yourself just like the rich and famous do by passing the time playing on the 24K gold foosball table. The players come drenched in a fine coat of either 24K gold or silver chrome while the frame is made from a gorgeous iroko wood.

Raise an unstoppable army during arts and crafts time by transforming 2D cardboard into 3D mechanized warriors with these DIY paper transformers. Each cardboard comes specially designed and perforated to transform between an automobile and a robot.

Have the adventure of a lifetime by taking an epic road trip in your very own 1961 Volkswagen Bus. Considered by many to be the “holy grail” of the hippie era, it has received over 1000 man hours of restoration work, and will turn heads wherever you go.

The future is upon us – you can now download a car! Rather than driving a generic factory produced appliance on wheels, you can now whiz around town in a custom built and eco-friendly 3D printed electric car that is unlike anything else on the road.

Consume drugs like your forefathers did in the days of disco by sparking up with this groovy lava lamp water pipe. The throwback design recalls a simpler and more happening time when the music was twice as good but the grass was twice as weak.

Transform yourself into your favorite crimefighter every night by hitting the hay with one of these superhero sleeping masks. Each mask features a high quality cartoon-like design of a half asleep superhero fighting to stay awake.

Hang out with your favorite radioactive reptiles whenever you want by crafting these crochet Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. Using the helpful pattern you can expertly crochet the entire gang dressed in their signature colored bands.

Put a big smile on your little rugrat’s face when you surprise them with some geeky cupcakes on their special day. Whether they’re into wizards, Time Lords, or are simply a fan of any major cartoon series, they’ll be able to sink their teeth into their favorite characters.

Broaden your horizons by taking a leisurely trip around the shore on the one person electric boat. The sophisticated design allows you to effortlessly navigate for up to six hours while you comfortably relax in a luxury seat with built-in speakers.

Experience a comfort food staple in a brand new way by topping off your outfit with these peanut butter and jelly socks. These hybrid cotton and spandex high socks provide a comfortable fit as you showcase the classic PB&J combo on your legs.

Appear a little less pathetic to your loyal followers by taking your selfies using the fake arm selfie stick. The clever design allows you to get some distance between you and the camera while creating the illusion that someone actually loves you.

When searching for the perfect furniture piece for your home, the R2-D2 pinball/coffee table is the one you’re looking for. This one of a kind piece features an out of this world design that comes with an authentic Star Wars pinball playfield housed in R2’s droid body.

Give your futuristic looking laptop a more rustic aesthetic by protecting its exterior with this cherry wood MacBook skin. The design provides an eco-friendly way to give your already beautiful laptop an understated elegance.

Get the kids to bone up on their anatomy during recess by having them play on the human skeleton jungle gym. This macabre jungle gym features a unique and slightly grim design that guarantees your kids chronic night terrors for the remainder of their childhood years.

Injury and old age will never be able to crush your adventurous spirit when you’re riding atop the all terrain vehicle wheelchair. The all wheel drive paired with the 6×6 transmission will get you through some of the toughest terrain imaginable with ease.

Keep up with your thriving social life without leaving your sweetie feeling ignored by wearing this texting hat. While you text, share, and ‘Like’ selfies, the image at the top of the hat will maintain perfect eye contact with your loved one at all times as she yaps away.

Experience the VIP treatment without breaking the bank when you attach these bottle sparklers to your favorite alcoholic beverage. These glorified fireworks emit a shower of eye catching sparks that shoot 8 inches up and burn for 45 seconds.

Go from dreadful board room meetings to gnarly surf sessions – and vice versa – without ever having to change outfits when you wear a literal wet suit. Available in one of three bespoke styles – these wetsuits guarantee you’ll always make a splash.

Step into the future of film making by shooting your next project using this ultra high definition 8K widescreen camera. If 4K just doesn’t cut it for you, this camera lets you shoot video at 8192 x 4320 resolution at a minimum rate of 75 FPS.

Bake up delicious mythical creatures the whole family will love using this dragon cake pan. It’s made from heavy cast aluminum alloy and molded into a design that allows you to bake a fierce looking mother dragon guarding her precious eggs.

Get the attention of everyone on the street when you pass them by riding this vintage electric bicycle. This unique ride seamlessly merges together modern technology with classic styling to produce a bike that Pee-Wee Herman would drool over.

Be the envy of every biker in town when you roll down the street riding the steam powered motorcycle. Its one of a kind design recalls a simpler time before the rise of fossil fuels – making this the ultimate collectible for gear heads and history buffs alike – choo choo!

Give the incomparable Neil Peart a run for his money by trying to play the iconic YYZ on the 360 degree drum kit. This insane musical instrument surrounds you with a combination of drums, snares, and cymbals you can bang on no matter where you move.

Shatter records at the track by going from 0-60 in 2.4 seconds behind the wheel of this high performance electric Mustang. This modern classic is capable of producing up to 800 horsepower and 1800 lb-ft. of torque – satisfying even the wildest adrenaline junkies.

Don’t let Jr. get in the way of your active lifestyle – instead take him along for the ride using the jogging stroller. The functional design features a comfortable hip strap that you wear to pull the stroller without creating a bumpy ride for your offspring.

Exercise your second amendment rights with style by carrying around the gold Desert Eagle gun. This distinguished semi-automatic firearm features a one of a kind golden facade and a barrel that is locked in place to ensure a high degree of accuracy.

Become the center of attention at the office by turning yourself into the office pet with this realistic cat head mask. Ideal for everything from pranks to running errands, this over sized mask transforms your pathetic human skull into that of a majestic feline.

Ensure your night of debauchery goes off without a hitch by firing off a few rounds using these tactical shot glasses. The glasses are styled after the flash hinder for the M16A2 family of firearms and are made from anodized aluminum.

Give your living room an exotic look with the addition of the hippopotamus chair. This remarkable chair accurately portrays a hippo’s shape and size while his distinguished barrel shaped torso makes for an extremely comfortable resting spot.

titleEN: Harry Potter Monster Book Of Monsters
content: Ensure you ace Rubeus Hagrid’s Care Of Magical Creatures course by studying up with the Harry Potter monster book of monsters. This replica prop comes with meticulous attention to detail – making it a must have collectible for any fan of the series.

Show the Caped Crusader some love by sporting these novelty Batman silhouette tights. The design on these geeky tights creates the image of Batman’s ominous silhouette on your legs to give your outfit an eye catching x-factor.

Share a Dick Butt with your loved ones by baking some delicious internet themed treats using the Dick Butt cookie cutter. The cutter comes with a smooth white matte finish and is made from sturdy plastic so you can bake Dick Butts for years to come.

Assert your dominance by showing everyone you’re tougher than nails as you bite into one of these chocolate tools. They’re expertly made to resemble real tools, making them the perfect gift idea for the handyman with a sweet tooth.

Take the sting out of tearing someone’s heart to shreds by ending your doomed relationship with the break up bean plant. As the beans sprout and grow, they reveal a gentle message saying “It’s Over” and “Lets Be Friends”.

Place a magical twist on your muggle party by having guests play Harry Potter inspired quidditch beer pong. Straight from the binge drinking dorms of Hogwarts, this thrilling game comes with everything you need to drink butterbeer til you cast vomitus eruptous.

Your loves of toys and technology come together in the LEGO computer. This custom PC’s exterior comes with a bold black design in the shape of a giant LEGO brick while the inside boasts a fully functional operating system capable of handling your daily workload.

Upgrade your bathroom with a throne fit for a king by installing this Game Of Thrones inspired Iron Throne structure around your existing toilet. Designed by  Tim Baker Creations, this unique toilet is the ultimate crapper for Game Of Thrones superfans.

Witness the majesty of Mother Nature when you stare into the brilliant formation of the sunset fire opal. The opal features a unique cloudy formation that makes it appear as if the stone contains a miniature sky that is ablaze.

Enjoy the sweet and inebriating taste of jello shots without the hassle by whipping them up using the automatic jello shot machine. This must have party machine takes out all the hard work – allowing you to make delicious edible shots in mere minutes.

Nothing says “you’re always on my mind” like giving your sweetie a few used up hollow points in the form of this bullet flower pot. This metallic flower displays 3 lovely bloomed bullet flowers sprouting from a field of shell casings – making it ideal for gun enthusiasts.

Have you ever wondered what major Hollywood releases would look like had they been produced in the golden era of the 1980s? Each movie and TV show in this concept art project features its own unique casing, decorated with a convincingly retro design.

Carve up sandy dunes like they were fresh powder by getting behind the wheel of this turbocharged ATV. Designed to excel in rugged terrain, this turbocharged vehicle boasts a 121HP engine and a completely redesigned clutch for better power transfer.

Conquer Mother Nature by traversing it on the personal hovercraft. This recreational vehicle comfortably seats two and comes with a 7-blade propulsion fan and an indestructible Kevlar lower hull to keep you feeling safe in any environment.

Pump up the bass and douse the blaze by using the revolutionary sound powered fire extinguisher. The first of its kind, it utilizes low-frequency sound waves to effectively put out a flame – proving that a thumping bass can do a lot more than raise the roof.

Show your favorite Pokemon some love as you let your geek flag fly high while wearing this pixelated Pokemon dress. The design mashes various 8-bit Pokemon together to create an abstract pattern and color scheme that’ll turn heads wherever you go.

Journey to a mystical and largely unexplored world by venturing into the depths of the ocean in this real life yellow submarine. The sub comfortably seats two and is outfitted with a ring of lights along the front that make this vessel ideal for launch and recovery.

Save yourself the agony of having to drag a broken suitcase down the airport by travelling using the retractable wheels suitcase instead. The wheel mechanisms are made from aircraft aluminum and tuck in to prevent damage while in transit.

Step back in time as you bring one of the planet’s greatest predators back from extinction with the animatronic T-Rex dinosaur. This tyrant lizard boasts a solid mechanical design and is expertly crafted based on archaeological findings for maximum realism.

Safeguard yourself from dangerous wildlife encounters by wearing the anti-bear attack backpack. If you find yourself in an undesirable situation out in bear country, this pack will emit a spray that deters your predator – and can even be deployed even while pinned!

Receive a first hand look at what Gotham would look like if evil prevailed with the Joker’s trophy room poster. Every one of his foes, both good and bad has paid the ultimate price and has become just another head in his twisted collection.

Place a new spin on the way you tell time by sporting this one of a kind magnetic watch. The innovative design employs a magnet that rotates two ball bearings around the watch’s face allowing users to tell time by touch – making it ideal for the visually impaired.

What better way for a gamer to give their room some great ambient lighting than with this Pac-Man ghost lamp. Styled like Pac-Man’s dreaded enemies, this retro lamp phases through 16 different colors and features a party mode that changes color to the beat.

Make the friendly skies a bit friendlier by taking to the air equipped with the smart watch for fighter pilots. This smartphone enabled multi-function chronograph boasts a wide range of functions like an electronic tachometer – making it the ultimate pilot’s accessory.

Houston, we have a drinking problem. Crafted using an Ale yeast that actually made the incredible journey to space and back, this singular brew uses some of the planets finest ingredients to create an unrivaled taste that is out of this world – literally.

Display your geeky roots proudly on your sleeve for all to see with this binary watch. This tricked out timepiece forgoes the classic design for a unique model which utilizes a low power micro controller to display the date and time.

Give your prized Marvel collection an over-the-top addition with this life size Hulkbuster statue. This ginormous statue is modeled after Mr. Stark’s latest and most impressive Iron Man suit which he uses to stand his ground against the seemingly invincible Hulk.

Prolong your survival after the zombie apocalypse begins by evading the undead in true badass fashion on Daryl’s motorcycle from The Walking Dead. His iconic chopper jumps off the screen and onto the real world as it’s recreated right down to the smallest detail.

Revolutionize the way you inebriate yourself by creating one of a kind drinks with the dual chamber shot glass. Separate compartments allow you to pour both  your chaser and liquor shot into the same glass without them ever mixing.

Transport Earth’s greatest hero from the TV screen to your own bedroom with this Dragon Ball Z holographic display. Through the wonders of holographic technology, our favorite super Saiyan comes to life in brilliant animated color.

Spruce up your bedroom’s plain decor by putting your extensive video game collection on display using the disc wall mounts. These easy to install dots can be stuck on virtually any spot on your walls so all your games remain visible and close at hand.

Turn heads as you set land speed records at the track while behind the wheel of the wooden go-kart. This unique ride comes with all the parts and tools required for assembly – along with the engine – and is capable of reaching speeds up to 25 miles per hour.

Nothing says “I love you” better than an actual sculpture of your anus. Each sentimental token is created by making a physical cast from your anus – displaying your unique beauty through the intricate detailing of your bicycle spokes.

Learn to navigate through life’s toughest trials with grace and wisdom by educating yourself using these fake self help books. Whether you’re struggling with your offspring becoming a Centaur or just want to get better at human sacrifices, you’ll find the ideal guide.

When the safe word fails you need an exit strategy for those kinky cuffs – so evade your dominatrix by keeping a concealable universal handcuff key on you at all times. It boasts a sturdy construction yet is small enough to fit comfortably in your anus.

Long ago in a kingdom far away reined an all-powerful Sith Lord whose powers were feared second only to his medieval Darth Vader armor. Now this one of a kind relic from the past has been unearthed and displayed in all its splendor.

Chomp down and fill your mouth up with cavities while you bone up on your archaeology by snacking on the chocolate Megalodon shark tooth. This once fearsome predator’s giant seven inch teeth are recreated in savory milk chocolate for your enjoyment.

Let your kids traverse the post apocalyptic world with their little adorable gang of violent anarchists using these Mad Max Power Wheels cars. They’re perfect for elaborate adrenaline pumping car chases filled with large explosions and dangerous vehicular stunts.

From uncharted regions of the universe comes the legend of the Voltron cat condo – loved by felines and feared by evil. He stands almost six feet tall and features brightly colored tunnel-like appendages ideal for providing shelter for all your feline friends.

Bring narcissism full circle with help from the 360 degree selfie camera rig. Simply mount this colossal rig to your chest, plump your duck faced lips out, and take your selfie game to the next level as you capture angles of your self you never thought possible.

Expand your collection with some of the greatest titles in gaming history courtesy of the monthly retro game delivery service. Every month, you’ll receive a special shipment containing various carefully selected titles that are yours to keep.

Take the little ones on a journey they’ll never forget when you snap their picture using this Jurassic Park themed photography set. This intricately designed set surrounds your little explorer in a prehistoric environment complete with a terrifying T-Rex.

Be better safe than sorry on your next adventure by branding your young ones with a child safety temporary tattoo. Each tattoo can be customized to display important contact or medical information – like food allergies –  in the event of an emergency.

Stay prepared for any attack that may come your way by toting this discreet bulletproof messenger bag. Upon detecting a threat, a quick flick of the wrist swiftly deploys a 3-foot blanket of armor capable of standing up to a barrage of .44 magnum rounds.

Own a piece of motorcycle history with the acquisition of the ultra-rare 1907 Harley-Davidson to your automotive collection. One of the first “strap tank” models built at the turn of the century, it’s easily one of the most coveted pieces of all Milwaukee machinery.

Fill up your stomach while you drain your life savings dining on the worlds most expensive hamburger. This over-the-top luxury burger comes stacked with a slew of top-shelf ingredients – like golden flakes – to send your taste buds to upper class ecstasy.

Keep Mr. Kitty from overheating your laptop while you pretend to work from home by keeping him distracted with the heated keyboard cat bed. Just like your PC, the keyboard heats up to provide your feline friend with a warm, cozy place he won’t ever get kicked off from.

Give your bedroom a bit of gamer flair with these ultra comfy Tetris 3D pillows. These officially licensed pillows feature extremely vibrant colors designed in five different classic shapes, and are machine washable so you can always keep them looking fresh.

Harness the power of dirty energy and help save the planet – one wanking session at a time – with the energy generating masturbation bracelet. The more time you spend stroking your long john, the more power you generate – energy crisis averted!

Hang ten even when it’s completely flat out by hitting the water on the electric powered surf board. With this sweet ride no matter what the conditions are like, you’ll be able to carve through the water with the greatest of ease.

Pay homage to the porcelain rock gods by redecorating your throne with the guitar toilet seat cover. Perfect for adding some pizzazz to any bathroom, these highly detailed lids perfectly recreate some of the most iconic guitar models.

Become one with nature without having to endure all the hardships that come with it by seeking shelter in the tree cabin tent. The bold suspended design keeps you safe from potential threats while providing a breath-taking 360 degree view of your surroundings.

Keep your movie star good looks out of any and all pictures by wearing the anti-paparazzi reflective clothing. This game changing garment comes coated with tons of glass nanospheres that become energized by camera flashes – blurring you out of photos.

Hit your mark every time when using the precision guided smart rifle. The rifle incorporates the same technology found in fighter jets to provide unheard of accuracy while letting you stream live footage so you can share your kills with your gun wielding brethren.
